questions.question: Q1. Which of the following statement is true about ferrocene?

answers.a: Ferrocene can be nitrated by reaction with concentrated HNO 3.
answers.b: Cyclopentadienyl ring in ferrocene is staggered.
answers.c: Cyclopentadienyl rings in ferrocene are almost eclipsed.
answers.d: Decamethyl ferrocene is staggered in the liquid state.

questions.question: Q2. Ferrocene is only _____________________ in chlorinated electrolytes?
Q3. The Fe<sup>III/II</sup> redox couple of ferrocene is used as an internal or pseudo reference when reporting ______________ of a redox-active species.
Q4. Which of the following statement is true about ferrocene?

answers.a: Kealy and Pauson synthesize ferrocene from C 5 H 5 and freshly reduced Fe at 300℃.
answers.d: Kealy and Pauson synthesizes ferrocene from C<sub>5</sub>H<sub>5</sub>MgBr and FeCl<sub>3.</sub>

questions.question:
Q6. Which of the following statement is false about ferrocene? 
		I. All Fe-C are of equal length. 
		II. It is the first discovered organometallic compound. 
		III. C is sp<sup>2</sup> hybridized. 
		IV. C is sp<sup>3</sup> hybridized.
Q7. The π-electrons in the cyclopentadienyl group of ferrocene are ___________.
Q8. Which of the following is the reference electrode?
